expression.invalid_expression_type: [Invalid Expression Type] The expression type given is not valid.
expression.invalid_operator: [Invalid Operator] The operator provided is invalid.
expression.function_not_found: [Function not Found] The execution expression's function was not found in the context.
expression.function_invalid: [Function Invalid] The execution expression's function value must be a function.
expression.variable_not_found: [Variable not Found] The variable path was not found in the context.
expression.bind_function_invalid: [Bind Function Invalid] The bind operation requires a function.
expression.bind_function_not_found: [Bind Function not Found] The bind function was not found.
expression.invalid_expression: [Invalid Expression] The expression does not fit any expression patterns.
